title: Propulsion Assignment
description: Explore the fundamentals of rocket propulsion, analyzing different propulsion systems and their efficiencies.

title: Combustion Analysis
description: Conduct an in-depth analysis of combustion processes within propulsion systems, focusing on thermodynamic principles.

title: Nozzle Design Project
description: Design and optimize a rocket nozzle, considering factors such as material selection and flow dynamics.

title: Aerodynamics Quiz
description: Test your understanding of aerodynamic principles and their application in aerospace engineering through a series of challenging questions.

title: Flow Analysis
description: Perform a detailed analysis of fluid flow around various aerospace structures, using computational fluid dynamics (CFD) tools.

title: Heating Analysis
description: Analyze the thermal effects on aerospace materials and structures during high-speed flight, using heat transfer principles.

title: Structural Design Task
description: Tackle the complexities of structural design for aerospace applications, focusing on strength, stability, and material science.

title: Orbital Calculations
description: Calculate orbital trajectories and parameters for different types of space missions, applying principles of astrodynamics.

title: Systems Engineering Exam
description: Demonstrate your knowledge of systems engineering by solving problems related to the integration and management of aerospace systems.
